title: Model Viewer for Ingame Character and Item View
description: This Model Viewer enables you to simply add a Character / Item Viewer to your Game with posibility to apply custom parameters to the Model.
longDescription:
Join us on > Discord <


Features Video: https://youtu.be/Qo9Q0-f6l_8


This Model Viewer gives the opportunity to simply add a Character/Item Viewer through UMG Widget to the game, known from plenty MMOs, Survival Games and so on.

Integration is pretty simple and needs not much setup. It's prepared to use 2 ModelViewers simultaneously like for a Character and for an Item Viewer.


There are simple blueprint functions to change the Model viewed inside the ModelViewer.

You can also pass parameters to the Model. Your character, for example, wears a weapon. Pass the weapon information to the ModelViewer, and on the other end just tell the model to equip a certain weapon based on the given parameter. This way you can easily automate a whole equipment system, character customizations and much more in realtime.

Integrated is a small demo where you can change the characters color, passed to the ModelViewer by a simple variable.


Everything is built using blueprints and is well commented, so you can simply build more functionality on top of it, change the widgets style or integrate the widget into existing projects.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Character / Item Viewer usable ingame through UMG Widget
  • Easy integration
  • Rotate/Zoom/Pan through Mouse
  • Rotate/Zoom through UI Buttons
  • Button to reset the View
  • Button to start/stop Autorotate (see the model 360Â°)
  • Prepared for passing your customization parameters to the mesh (equipment, hair, skin color...)


Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of Widgets: 3

Input:

  • C - Open/Close Character Viewer
  • I - Open/Close Item Viewer
  • Left Click Drag (in Viewer) - Rotate
  • Right Click Drag (in Viewer) - Pan
  • Wouse Wheel (in Viewer) - Zoom

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
